name: Marabundle
description:
Marabundle is a collection of 4 games by small Brazilian studios. One Bundle, four games: 1 hack n' slash action game! 1 co-op puzzle platformer; 1 collectible card game with "slap and swap" mechanics! 1 action shoot 'em up! All these 4 games in one single bundle!

Check the description of each game included in this bundle:


On the street in your neighborhood, the biggest Bafo competition in history is taking place. Face powerful opponents in a turn based combat and collect all the cards to be known as the Grand Champion of Bafo.


Smear the skies with pieces of alien spaceships in Dogfights in SLZ, an arcade shoot'em up with a challenging and addictive aerial combat game.


Cross an unknown nation to escape a devastated and scarce place, seeking a land full of resources to bring rest and prosperity to its people,
who bet their very lives on your journey. Defeat monsters trying to stop you in a hack'n slash, procedurally generated game!


Join a friend and travel through the state of Maranhão by train preventing it from stopping because of its broken wagons by solving small puzzles on this co-op platformer game
